column1: #Text=This story gives broader context to the earlier reports of the abuse of band finances by the native leadership.
#Text=The hardship on the reserves does have to be addressed but the people who have to lead on this are the reserve leaders themselves.
#Text=Trying to do anything from the outside, as was the case recently with education, will be another waste of time and scarce money, resulting more bruised feelings.
#Text=We have to see the problem for what it is : reserve based and nurtured.
